channel.title: [562] Perfect Ring
channel.description: Okay so I the ring to have 1m bonus through the itemdefinition.xml and when I equip it in game I have the bonus but can still take damage, even though the def bonus is 1m, but ik it worked because I one hit everything. Any help making it so the user is invincible?

item.title: [562] Perfect Ring
item.dc:creator: @andrew894 andrew894
item.description:
@andrew894 wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:2, topic:407091”][quote author=andrew894 link=topic=508385.msg3688077#msg3688077 date=1311963973]
Okay so I the ring to have 1m bonus through the itemdefinition.xml and when I equip it in game I have the bonus but can still take damage, even though the def bonus is 1m, but ik it worked because I one hit everything. Any help making it so the user is invincible?
[/quote]Increase the HP when a player wields it.[/quote]

How do I do that?

Read full topic
